@graph.abstract: Quantitative Methods to Ensure the Reliability, Maintainability, and Availability of Computer Hardware and Software -- Overview of Software Reliability Engineering -- Statistical Quality Control -- Risk, Reliability, and Testing Case Study -- Models for Systems and Software Engineering -- Software Reliability Metrics -- Software Reliability and Metrics Tools -- Integrating Testing with Reliability -- Architecture, Performance, Reliability, and Availability -- Internet Fault Tree Analysis for Reliability Estimation -- Standard for Software Reliability -- Simulation and Analytical Models: A Comparison -- ObjectOriented Methods for Modeling Software Reliability -- Cyber Security Prediction Models -- Ergonomics and Safety in the Workplace -- Facility Layout and Location Models -- Inventory Control -- Scheduling -- Forecasting Models -- Cost Analysis
